imdb.title: Kyoukai no kanata
imdb.plot: The dark fantasy follows a high school sophomore named Akihito Kanbara. Although the boy appears human, he is half Youmu and invulnerable to wounds because he can heal quickly. One day, Akihito meets freshman Mirai Kuriyama when i...

episodes.title: ONA: Even as You Waver, the Nation Judges You #4
episodes.plot: Akihito is standing in the courtroom when his mother Yayoi appears and begins to embarrass him. It's revealed that she is on trial for being annoying. She is sentenced to switch bodies with Akihito, however she begins to embarrass him further while in his body.

episodes.title: ONA: Even as You Waver, the Nation Judges You #5
episodes.plot: Izumi is called to stand trial, but the girls are too terrified of her to sentence her with anything and proclaim her innocent. She responds that she must have been brought there under false charges and steps forward to punish them, smiling. The camera cuts away as the girls let out a collective scream. After this, Akihito reveals this event, and possibly the previous 4, were just a weird dream he had.

episodes.title: ONA: Even as You Waver, the Nation Judges You #1
episodes.plot: Akihito somehow finds himself in a courtroom as a defendant being tried for his glasses fetish by 'chibi' versions of accusers Mitsuki, Mirai and Sakura along with Judge Ai. The girls present evidence of Akihitos perverted habits and carry out a punishment.

episodes.title: ONA: Even as You Waver, the Nation Judges You #2
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: ONA: Even as You Waver, the Nation Judges You #3

episodes.title: Carmine
episodes.plot: One can't die, and one can manipulate blood. When these two meet, a chain of events will take place that will send their intertwined fates into wild directions.

episodes.title: Ultramarine
episodes.plot: Mirai successfully takes down her first Youmo, with a little help from Akihito. Later, they find out about a menacing new monster on it's way to town.

episodes.title: Moonlight Purple
episodes.plot: The Hollow Shadow has crept ever closer to town, and while all other spirit warriors go into hiding, Mirai is determined to take it down.

episodes.title: Bitter Orange
episodes.plot: The Hollow Shadow has trapped Mirai and Akihito in a neverending labyrinth. However, defeating it is only the beginning...

episodes.title: Chartreuse Light
episodes.plot: As punishment for going after the Hollow Shadow, Mirai's hunting license is revoked for one month. She's forced to take a part time job, but learns more about herself in the process.

episodes.title: Shocking Pink
episodes.plot: A special youmo with a penchant for pretty girls gives Mirai a tough time. Akiyama enlists the Literary Club for support.

episodes.title: Color of Clouds
episodes.plot: Akiyama finds a weakened Sakura and assists her. Later, Sakura confrints Mirai, seeking vengeance.

episodes.title: Calming Gold
episodes.plot: The Calm, a time of fear for all youmu and half youmu alike, is fast approaching. As the clock stirkes midnight, all youmu become weakened, and thus, become easy prey.

episodes.title: Silver Bamboo
episodes.plot: Akihito has lost control and his youmu side has awakened. Mirai is faced with the hardest decision of her life.

episodes.title: White World
episodes.plot: Mirai succesfully stopped Beyond the Boundary, but at a great cost. The truth behind Mirai's past is revealed.

episodes.title: Black World
episodes.plot: Mirai's battle with Beyond the Boundary rages on in a new dimension, while Akihito tries to figure out how to bring her back.

episodes.title: Gray World
episodes.plot: Akihito reunited with Mirai within Beyond the Boundary. Meanwhile, the Nase family fights a different war on the other side in the thrilling conclusion of Beyond the Boundary.

episodes.title: OVA: Daybreak
episodes.plot: Episode 0 takes place two years prior to the TV series when the Nase siblings meet Akihito for the first time in a mission for Hiroomi. Mitsuki follows her brother on this mission and their goal is to subjugate Akihito.
